dalada pradarshana awastha waladi wasi ada watenneya yanna itha parani wishwasayaki.ewani wishwasayak samajaye mul basa thibenne ahambayakin wiya nohakiya.ema wishwasaya arambaune kedina wuwada mepamana kalayak eya pawathagena enne ahambayakin nowana bawa amuthuwen kiwa yuthu natha.dethun wathawak pamanak eya sidu wuye nam ewani prabala wishwasayak bauddhayanta nolabena bawada pahadiliya.merata bhauthikawadi pandithayan kawarak kiwada ema sansiddhiya sakshya washayen sangatha bawa apata piliganimata siduweyi.apidu ema siddhiya dewarakma athwinda aththemu.apata pera paramparawo eetath wada ee athwinda athuwata saka natha.athithaye sitama dalada pradarshana ha perahara sanwidhanaya kerune warshawa laba ganime aramunada peradariwaya.dethun wathawakata wada ee sarthaka nowuye nam perahara wuwa metharam kalayak nopawathinu atha.me mahathwarunta ee pilibandawa kiwa hakke monawada?
